name: Metolius Simulator 3D Hangboard
description: Fingerboards allow you to train for power and contact strength without leaving the confines of your bedroom. The Simulator’s multitude of edges, slopers, and pockets provide the perfect training menu for getting stronger on the rock, or in the gym. The size enables some side-to-side movement on lock-offs, unlike smaller boards. To avoid injury, some research in climbing strength training is recommended.Made of polyester resin.3 full-hand jugs, 2 rounded full-hand slopers, 2 flat slopers, 3 sets of triple-finger pockets, 3 sets of double-finger pockets, lots of edges.Skin-friendly board tapers from top to bottom to provide forearm clearance.CNC milled for perfect symmetry.Instructions, mounting hardware, and workout guide included.71.1cm long, 22.2cm high.Sorry, no colour choice.
